original_query: SELECT MIN(c.Id) FROM comments as c, posts as p, postLinks as pl, postHistory as ph, votes as v WHERE p.Id = pl.PostId AND p.Id = v.PostId AND p.Id = ph.PostId AND p.Id = c.PostId AND c.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-10 02:42:35' AS TIMESTAMP) AND p.Score>=-1 AND p.ViewCount<=5896 AND p.AnswerCount>=0 AND p.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-07-29 15:57:21' AS TIMESTAMP) AND v.VoteTypeId=2
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM comments AS comments WHERE comments.CreationDate <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-10 02:42:35'
CREATE VIEW E5 AS SELECT * FROM votes AS votes WHERE votes.VoteTypeId = 2
CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM postHistory AS postHistory
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E5E4 AS SELECT * FROM E5 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4 WHERE E5.PostId=E4.PostId)
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM posts AS posts WHERE posts.Score >= -1 AND posts.ViewCount <= 5896 AND posts.AnswerCount >= 0 AND posts.CreationDate >= TIMESTAMP '2010-07-29 15:57:21'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E5E4E2 AS SELECT * FROM E5E4 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2 WHERE E5E4.PostId=E2.Id)
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM postLinks AS postLinks
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E5E4E2E3 AS SELECT * FROM E5E4E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E5E4E2.PostId=E3.PostId)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E5E4E2E3 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E5E4E2E3 WHERE E1.PostId=E5E4E2E3.PostId)
